name: Honey Bee Mine
description: Honey and vanilla laced with white rum and charged with champagne. Perfect for Valentine's Day. Created February 2014 by Simon Difford at the Cabinet Room, London, England.

ingredients.ingredient: Bacardi Carta Blanca Superior White Rum

directions: Stir honey with rum in base of shaker to dissolve honey
Shake with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
Garnish with lemon zest twist (discarded) and honeycomb on rim
